metadata.Title: CVE-2016-7569 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Directory traversal vulnerability in docker2aci before 0.13.0 allows remote attackers to write to arbitrary files via a .. (dot dot) in the embedded layer data in an image.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-7569` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

docker2aci - 0.14.0+dfsg-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: golang-github-appc-docker2aci package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.14.0+dfsg-2').
